comment.author: 61013804@N08
comment._content: The prominent tower is St John's Cathedral. The trees are to the west of the Cathedral. The very small hill to the right of the spires of the Cathedral should be Morrison Hill. The bay to the left of this should be the sea which is now Victoria Park. Further out you may imagine a small island amongst the ships called Kellet Island, which is now land adjacent to the Cross Harbour Tunnel entrance. The hill behind it is the hills in North Point, like Fortress Hill.
